name: Tick Tock Tuna
description:
Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Spacebar to start game.

Will you survive the unforgiving clockwork ocean? Maybe you will become the king of the seas? You will need to consume other fish in order to grow, but be careful! Grow too big too quickly and the pressure won't be enough to hold you together! Grow as big as you can and dive deeper, where formidable opponents await you!
